project.description: Syncs Jenkins config.xml to S3 backup

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: set +x set +x echo '-------------------------------------------' echo " Syncing Jenkins job configurations to s3 " echo '-------------------------------------------' echo ' ' echo 'Host:' hostname echo ' ' echo '-------------------------------------------' echo 'Running as user:' whoami echo ' ' echo '-------------------------------------------' echo 'Working directory:' pwd echo ' ' sudo rsync -avm --include="config.xml" --include="nextBuildNumber" -f 'hide,! */' /var/lib/jenkins/jobs /home/ec2-user/s3
